text: Hi everyone, he ’ s Olaf and he likes warm hugs and frozen adventures! If you saw ‘ Frozen ’ than you know that Olaf, the snowman with the heart of gold, sure knows how to steal the show. That ’ s why Disney is releasing a featurette in November called ‘ Olaf ’ s Frozen Adventure ’, which is, of course, starring Olaf. The 21 - minute animated short will open in theatres before in front of Disney / Pixar ’ s full - length animated feature Coco beginning on November 22. But before the short film skates into theatres, fans will be able to get their paws on a slew of ‘ Olaf ’ s Frozen Adventure ’ products for purchase.
